```{r Functions}
labelize <- function(df)
{
  x <- colnames(df)

  for(i in 1:ncol(df))
  {
    original_name <- colnames(df[i])
    print(original_name)
    label(df[[i]]) <- original_name
    j <- readline(prompt=paste("Name this variable:"))
    colnames(df)[i] <- j
  }
}
```
